qas.question: Who did the government want raised as white?
What was the goal of removing mixed races from their homes?

answers.text: Eliminate the full-blood and permit the white admixture to half-castes and eventually the race will become white"

qas.question: What were the mixed race individuals kept from doing?

answers.text: speaking their native language and practising traditional customs

qas.question: What was this process referred to?

context: The official policy became one of biological and cultural assimilation: "<a1_0>Eliminate the full-blood and permit the white admixture to half-castes and eventually the race will become white"<a1_0/>. This led to different treatment for "black" and <a0_0>"half-caste" individuals<a0_0/>, with lighter-skinned individuals targeted for removal from their families to be raised as "white" people, restricted from <a2_0>speaking their native language and practising traditional customs<a2_0/>, a process now known as <a3_0>the Stolen Generation<a3_0/>.
